meanings.sent1: She miseats by trying to use a fork as a spoon.
meanings.sent2: He always miseats by chewing with his mouth open.
meanings.sent3: At the party, he miseats by putting dessert on his plate before the main course.
meanings.sent4: Her cat miseats by playing with its food before finally eating it.
meanings.sent5: The child miseats by mixing ketchup with ice cream.

meanings.definition: To consume food in a disorderly or messy manner.
meanings.sent1: The toddler miseats by throwing food on the floor.
meanings.sent2: During the picnic, they miseat by spilling drinks everywhere.
meanings.sent3: He miseats by accidentally dropping spaghetti on his lap.
meanings.sent4: The raccoon miseats by scattering trash all over the yard.
meanings.sent5: The students miseat by leaving crumbs all over the classroom.
